unnormalised: AIIMS Delhi recently announced the appointment of Dr. Rajesh Kumar as the new Head of Cardiology. Dr. Kumar, formerly Prof. Kumar at PGI Chandigarh, brings over 20 years of experience in interventional cardiology to the role. The official announcement was made on 15/08/2024, coinciding with India’s Independence Day, adding a touch of significance to the occasion.

unnormalised: The selection process involved a rigorous evaluation of several candidates, including Dr. Sharma and Dr. Kapoor. He also has been crucial in training several cardiology fellows.
